original_text:
Your wrongdoings have kept these away;
    your sins have deprived you of good.
korean_text: 너희 허물이 이러한 일들을 물리쳤고 너희 죄가 너희로부터 좋은 것을 막았느니라

sentences.original_text: Your wrongdoings have kept these away
your sins have deprived you of good
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 죄가 당신에게서 좋은 것을 빼앗아갔습니다
